name: circumferential
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
going around the outside edge of a round or curved area, object, organ, or body part: circumferential dissection of the artery
More examplesFewer examplesRadiofrequency energy is applied in a circumferential series of dots around the cornea.A circumferential difference of just 3mm in the wheels could cause a problem.It may be necessary to relieve airway compression resulting from circumferential chest burns.There is constriction of the prolapsed mucosa in a circumferential pattern.
